description: fmt: remove an obsolete reference to os.ErrorString in a comment

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=988a7f023895 ***

fmt: remove an obsolete reference to os.ErrorString in a comment

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5229057

LGTM

On Wed, Oct 12, 2011 at 1:45 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> fmt: remove an obsolete reference to os.ErrorString in a comment
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5229057/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5229057/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/fmt/print.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/fmt/print.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/fmt/print.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/fmt/print.go
> @@ -190,7 +190,7 @@
>  }
>
>  // Errorf formats according to a format specifier and returns the string
> -// converted to an os.ErrorString, which satisfies the os.Error interface.
> +// as a value that satisfies os.Error.
>  func Errorf(format string, a ...interface{}) os.Error {
>        return os.NewError(Sprintf(format, a...))
>  }
>
>
>

subject: code review 5229057: fmt: remove an obsolete reference to os.ErrorString in ...
